# addHeldCall()

**Instance Method**

Adds held calls to the current conversation.

## Declaration

```swift
func addHeldCall()
```

## Holding Calls

- **holdCall()**: Places all active calls on hold and accepts a held or waiting call.
- **placeAllOthers(onHold:)**: Places all calls except the call with the specified index on hold.
